forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 65F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
